message_template: Your {{channel_name}} allocation of {{current_value}}% is approaching saturation. Marginal returns typically decline above 35%. Would you like me to model alternatives?
The confidence level for this projection is {{confidence_score}}%, which is relatively low. This is usually due to {{primary_reason}}. Would you like me to explain how to improve it?
The marginal return for {{channel_name}} has dropped to {{current_value}}x. Additional spend here may be better allocated elsewhere. Want me to identify higher-return opportunities?
I notice some data quality concerns with {{data_source}}: {{quality_issues}}. This affects my confidence in the projections. Would you like recommendations to improve data quality?
Your target CPM of ${{current_value}} is {{variance_pct}}% above the {{vertical}} benchmark of ${{benchmark_value}}. This might be intentional for premium inventory but I wanted to flag it.
Your target CPM of ${{current_value}} is {{variance_pct}}% below the {{vertical}} benchmark. This is efficient but verify the inventory quality meets your standards.
Based on your objectives, {{emerging_channel}} shows strong potential with {{benchmark_roas}}x benchmark ROAS for {{vertical}}. Would you like me to include it in the mix?
Your plan allocates {{current_value}}% to {{channel_name}}. This concentration creates risk if that channel underperforms. Consider diversifying to manage risk.
I notice your awareness-focused plan doesn't include video channels. Video typically drives 2-3x higher aided recall. Would you like me to model a video component?
With a ${{budget}} budget, an explicit attribution model helps justify spend and optimize in-flight. Would you like me to recommend an approach?
Your current measurement approach covers about {{coverage_pct}}% of the expected touchpoints. The gap is primarily in {{gap_area}}. Want me to suggest additions?
With a ${{budget}} budget, you could reserve 5-10% for a geo-based incrementality test to measure true lift. This would strengthen your optimization decisions. Interested?
Your primary KPI ({{primary_kpi}}) may not align well with your stated objective ({{objective}}). Consider {{recommended_kpi}} as a better indicator of success. Should I explain why?
I notice {{overlap_pct}}% overlap between your {{segment_1}} and {{segment_2}} segments. This could lead to frequency issues. Should I suggest refinements?
Your {{segment_name}} segment has an LTV index of {{ltv_index}}, significantly above average. Consider increasing allocation here for better long-term returns.
Your retention objective is noted but the audience strategy focuses on acquisition. Should I add a retention-focused segment strategy?
Your audience definition may be too narrow for the budget. At ${{budget}}, you might not reach enough people efficiently. Want me to suggest expansion options?
The media brief is missing {{missing_count}} recommended sections: {{missing_sections}}. Would you like me to add these for a more complete document?
Welcome back! Your last session was {{days_ago}} days ago. We had made progress on {{last_context}}. Would you like to continue where we left off or start fresh?
I have noticed you frequently work on {{pattern_description}}. I have learned some of your preferences and will apply them automatically. You can always override or ask me to forget.
